title: The Blood That Defines Us
description: Every house has its own history and its own secrets. Some secrets are just darker than others. And some are even downright terrifying.When the Johnsons moved into their new house, they didn’t expect that weird things would start to happen, objects would move on their own, and that the house’s history would come back to haunt them. But I did.
author: Majanka Verstraete
